summary: Dr. Janet L. Wasson permanently surrendered her medical license following allegations of professional incompetence, failure to meet quality medical care standards, and prescribing excessive controlled dangerous substances without justification. Her license was summarily suspended in April 2017, and she was later charged with continuing to practice and prescribe CDS while suspended. She voluntarily surrendered her license to avoid further prosecution of these disciplinary charges, which will be treated as if proven.
